trans-unit.source: Contains activities to be executed by the workflow runtime in an exception handling block.
trans-unit.target: Contém as atividades a serem executadas pelo tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho em um bloco de manipulação de exceção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Finally%2A> activity member of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch> activity that is the child of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> will not execute if an unhandled exception propagates past the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> boundary.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Finally%2A> membro de atividade de um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch> atividade que é o filho de um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> não será executado se uma exceção sem tratamento propaga após o <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> limite.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> activity.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> atividade.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Nesting of TransactionScope within a service](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/nesting-of-transactionscope-within-a-service.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é proveniente do [aninhamento de TransactionScope em um serviço](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/nesting-of-transactionscope-within-a-service.md) exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="M:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.#ctor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="M:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.#ctor" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> activity.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> atividade.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Nesting of TransactionScope within a service](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/nesting-of-transactionscope-within-a-service.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é proveniente do [aninhamento de TransactionScope em um serviço](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/nesting-of-transactionscope-within-a-service.md) exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The collection of <see langword="Catch" /> elements to be checked when the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Try" /> activity throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de elementos de <see langword="Catch" /> a ser selecionados quando a atividade de <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Try" /> lançar uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: The catch collection.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de captura.

trans-unit.source: Catches are evaluated in the order in which they are added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Detectando é avaliados na ordem em que eles são adicionados à coleção.

trans-unit.source: If an exact match for the exception type is found, the matching <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Catch> activity is executed.
trans-unit.target: Se for encontrada uma correspondência exata para o tipo de exceção, a correspondência <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Catch> atividade é executada.

trans-unit.source: If no exact match is found, the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Catch> with the closest matching <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Catch.ExceptionType%2A> is executed.
trans-unit.target: Não se for encontrada nenhuma correspondência exata, a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Catch> com a correspondência mais próxima <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Catch.ExceptionType%2A> é executado.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates setting the Catches property of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> activity.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra definindo a propriedade Catches de um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> atividade.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Nesting of TransactionScope within a service](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/nesting-of-transactionscope-within-a-service.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é proveniente do [aninhamento de TransactionScope em um serviço](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/nesting-of-transactionscope-within-a-service.md) exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Once placed in the designer, <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Catch> activities cannot be reordered in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez colocado no designer, <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Catch> atividades não podem ser reordenadas no designer.

trans-unit.source: To reorder the collection of <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Catch> activities, either delete and re-add them in the correct order, or use the xaml (code) view for the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Para reordenar a coleção de <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Catch> atividades, exclua e adicione-os novamente na ordem correta ou usar o modo de exibição xaml (código) para o fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The activity to be executed when the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Try" /> and any necessary activities in the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Catches" /> collection complete execution.
trans-unit.target: A atividade a ser executada quando <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Try" /> e todas as atividades necessárias na coleção de <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Catches" /> tiver terminado a execução.

trans-unit.source: The activity that represents the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Finally" /> logic.
trans-unit.target: A atividade que representa o <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Finally" /> lógica.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Finally%2A> property of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> activity.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra a configuração de <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Finally%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> atividade.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Nesting of TransactionScope within a service](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/nesting-of-transactionscope-within-a-service.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é proveniente do [aninhamento de TransactionScope em um serviço](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/nesting-of-transactionscope-within-a-service.md) exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The activity first executed when the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch" /> executes.
trans-unit.target: A atividade executada primeiro quando <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch" /> executar.

trans-unit.source: The activity.
trans-unit.target: A atividade.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates setting the Try property of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> activity.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra definindo a propriedade Try de uma <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> atividade.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Nesting of TransactionScope within a service](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/nesting-of-transactionscope-within-a-service.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é proveniente do [aninhamento de TransactionScope em um serviço](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/nesting-of-transactionscope-within-a-service.md) exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The collection of contained variables.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de variáveis contidas.

trans-unit.source: The collection of variables.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de variáveis.
